attributes.action: ".....increase the rate of the minimum wages by atleast 1% more with immediate effect...."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: .....well well well looks like inflation is going up up up along with the cost of living and survival of the fit it is... i believe along with many at the university of derby that the basis minimum wage needs to rise rise rise.... this rate rise needs to happen why? simply because the poor cannot be punished for the failing of other to control the cost of living in our own country..... so please please please lets see what the peop[le have to say...... be strong vote for the rise in your pay.....

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/povertywages/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
